profile_summary:

My expertise in **Event-driven architecture** and working with databases like **MongoDB** ensures robust back-end solutions. I have a proven track record in practicing **Continuous Integration** within Agile and Scrum methodologies, ensuring timely delivery and high-quality code through comprehensive **Unit testing**.

With a strong background in building high-performance solutions for healthcare and financial sectors, I also possess experience in modern front-end frameworks such as **React** and **Next.js**. My ability to communicate effectively and collaborate with cross-functional teams enhances project outcomes, making sure that solutions are not only innovative but also aligned with compliance standards.
